verses.verse: And Abraham <S%H85><s%> was old <S%H2204><s%>, and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in age <S%H3117><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> Abraham in all things <S%H85><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his servant <S%H5650><s%>, the elder <S%H2205><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>, that ruled over <S%H4910><s%> all that he had <S%H7760><s%>, Put, I pray thee <S%H3027><s%>, thy hand under my thigh <S%H3409><s%>:

and I will make thee swear <S%H7650><s%> by Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, that thou wilt not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, among <S%H7130><s%> whom I dwell <S%H3427><s%>:
but thou shalt go <S%H3212><s%> unto my country <S%H776><s%>, and to my kindred <S%H4138><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%>.

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H802><s%>, Peradventure the woman will not be willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H3212><s%> me <S%H310><s%> unto this land <S%H776><s%>: must I needs bring <S%H7725><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> from whence thou camest <S%H3318><s%>?
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H8104><s%>, Beware thou that thou bring <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H6435><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> thither again <S%H7725><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, who took me <S%H3947><s%> from my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, and from the land <S%H776><s%> of my nativity <S%H4138><s%>, and who spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H7650><s%>, and who sware unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, Unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> this land <S%H776><s%>; he will send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> before thee <S%H6440><s%>, and thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son from thence <S%H1121><s%>.

And if the woman <S%H802><s%> be not willing <S%H14><s%> to follow <S%H3212><s%> thee <S%H310><s%>, then thou shalt be clear <S%H5352><s%> from this my oath <S%H7621><s%>; only thou shalt not bring <S%H7725><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> thither again <S%H7725><s%>.

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> under the thigh <S%H3409><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his master <S%H113><s%>, and sware <S%H7650><s%> to him concerning <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> matter <S%H1697><s%>.

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%>, of the camels <S%H1581><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%>, and departed <S%H3212><s%>, having all goodly things <S%H2898><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%>'s in his hand <S%H3027><s%>: and he arose <S%H6965><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> to Mesopotamia <S%H763><s%>, unto the city <S%H5892><s%> of Nahor <S%H5152><s%>.

And he made <S%H1288><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> to kneel down <S%H1288><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> by <S%H413><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of evening <S%H6153><s%>, the time <S%H6256><s%> that women go out <S%H3318><s%> to draw water <S%H7579><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, send me <S%H6440><s%>, I pray thee <S%H7136><s%>, good speed this day <S%H3117><s%>, and show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>.

Behold <S%H5324><s%>, I am standing by the fountain <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>; and the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> are coming out <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%>:

and let it come to pass <S%H5291><s%>, that the damsel to whom I shall say <S%H559><s%>, Let down <S%H5186><s%> thy pitcher <S%H3537><s%>, I pray thee <S%H8354><s%>, that I may drink; and she shall say <S%H559><s%>, Drink <S%H8354><s%>, and I will give <S%H8248><s%> thy camels <S%H1581><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> also <S%H3198><s%>: let the same be she that thou hast appointed for thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaac <S%H3327><s%>; and thereby shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that thou hast showed <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto my master <S%H113><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H3615><s%>, before he had done speaking <S%H1696><s%>, that <S%H7259><s%>, behold, Rebekah came out <S%H3318><s%>, who <S%H834><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, the wife <S%H802><s%> of Nahor <S%H5152><s%>, Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>, with her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> upon her shoulder <S%H7926><s%>.

And the damsel <S%H5291><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> fair <S%H2896><s%> to look upon <S%H4758><s%>, a virgin <S%H1330><s%>, neither had any man <S%H376><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> her <S%H3381><s%>: and she went down to the fountain <S%H5869><s%>, and filled <S%H4390><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%>, and came up <S%H5927><s%>.

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet her <S%H7125><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Give me to drink <S%H1572><s%>, I pray thee <S%H4592><s%>, a little water <S%H4325><s%> from thy pitcher <S%H3537><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%>, Drink <S%H8354><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>: and she hasted <S%H4116><s%>, and let down <S%H3381><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> upon her hand <S%H3027><s%>, and gave him drink <S%H8248><s%>.

And when she had done <S%H3615><s%> giving him drink <S%H8248><s%>, she said <S%H559><s%>, I will draw <S%H7579><s%> for thy camels <S%H1581><s%> also <S%H3615><s%>, until they have done drinking <S%H8354><s%>.

And she hasted <S%H4116><s%>, and emptied <S%H6168><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> into the trough <S%H8268><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%> again unto the well <S%H875><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%>, and drew <S%H7579><s%> for all his camels <S%H1581><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> looked stedfastly <S%H7583><s%> on her <S%H2790><s%>, holding his peace, to know <S%H3045><s%> whether Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H6743><s%> his journey <S%H1870><s%> prosperous <S%H6743><s%> or not <S%H518><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H1581><s%>, as the camels had done <S%H3615><s%> drinking <S%H8354><s%>, that the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a golden <S%H2091><s%> ring <S%H5141><s%> of half a shekel <S%H1235><s%> weight <S%H4948><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> for her hands <S%H3027><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels weight <S%H4948><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%>, Whose <S%H4310><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> art thou <S%H859><s%>? tell <S%H5046><s%> me <S%H3426><s%>, I pray thee. Is there room <S%H4725><s%> in thy father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> for us to lodge in <S%H3885><s%>?
And she said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H1323><s%>, I am the daughter of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, whom she bare <S%H3205><s%> unto Nahor <S%H5152><s%>.

She said <S%H559><s%> moreover unto him <S%H1571><s%>, We have both straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> enough <S%H7227><s%>, and <S%H1571><s%> room <S%H4725><s%> to lodge in <S%H3885><s%>.
And the man <S%H376><s%> bowed his head <S%H6915><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, who hath not forsaken <S%H5800><s%> his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and his truth <S%H571><s%> toward my master <S%H113><s%>: as for me <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah hath led me <S%H5148><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%>'s brethren <S%H251><s%>.
And the damsel <S%H5291><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%>, and told <S%H5046><s%> her mother <S%H517><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> according to these words <S%H1697><s%>.

And Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> had a brother <S%H251><s%>, and his name <S%H8034><s%> was Laban <S%H3837><s%>: and Laban <S%H3837><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> unto the man <S%H376><s%>, unto the fountain <S%H5869><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H7200><s%>, when he saw the ring <S%H5141><s%>, and the bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon his sister <S%H269><s%>'s hands <S%H3027><s%>, and when he heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus <S%H3541><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> unto me <S%H935><s%>; that he came unto the man <S%H376><s%>; and <S%H5975><s%>, behold, he was standing by <S%H5921><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> at the fountain <S%H5869><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Come in <S%H935><s%>, thou blessed <S%H1288><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; wherefore standest <S%H5975><s%> thou without <S%H2351><s%>? for I have prepared <S%H6437><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>, and room <S%H4725><s%> for the camels <S%H1581><s%>.

And the man <S%H376><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%>, and he ungirded <S%H6605><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%>; and he gave <S%H5414><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> for the camels <S%H1581><s%>, and water <S%H4325><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the men that were with him <S%H582><s%>.

And there was set <S%H7760><s%> food before him <S%H6440><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>: but he said <S%H559><s%>, I will not eat <S%H398><s%>, until I have told <S%H1696><s%> mine errand <S%H1697><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, Speak on <S%H1696><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, I am Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s servant <S%H5650><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>; and he is become great <S%H1431><s%>: and he hath given <S%H5414><s%> him flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%>, and silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, and men-servants <S%H5650><s%> and maid-servants <S%H8198><s%>, and camels <S%H1581><s%> and asses <S%H2543><s%>.

And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> my master <S%H113><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to my master <S%H113><s%> when <S%H310><s%> she was old <S%H2209><s%>: and unto him hath he given all that he hath <S%H5414><s%>.

And my master <S%H113><s%> made me swear <S%H7650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, in whose land <S%H776><s%> I dwell <S%H3427><s%>:
but <S%H518><s%> thou shalt go <S%H3212><s%> unto my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, and to my kindred <S%H4940><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%>.
And I said <S%H559><s%> unto my master <S%H113><s%>, Peradventure the woman <S%H802><s%> will not follow me <S%H3212><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, before <S%H6440><s%> whom I walk <S%H1980><s%>, will send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> with thee <S%H6743><s%>, and prosper thy way <S%H1870><s%>; and thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of my kindred <S%H4940><s%>, and of my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>:

then shalt thou be clear <S%H5352><s%> from my oath <S%H423><s%>, when thou comest <S%H935><s%> to my kindred <S%H4940><s%>; and if they give <S%H5414><s%> her not to thee <S%H5355><s%>, thou shalt be clear from my oath <S%H423><s%>.

And I came <S%H935><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> unto the fountain <S%H5869><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, if now thou do <S%H3426><s%> prosper <S%H6743><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> which I go <S%H1980><s%>:

behold <S%H5324><s%>, I am standing by the fountain <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>; and let it come to pass <S%H5959><s%>, that the maiden that cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%>, to whom I shall say <S%H559><s%>, Give me <S%H8248><s%>, I pray thee <S%H4592><s%>, a little water <S%H4325><s%> from thy pitcher <S%H3537><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%>;

and she shall say <S%H559><s%> to me <S%H8354><s%>, Both drink thou <S%H7579><s%>, and I will also draw for thy camels <S%H1581><s%>: let the same be the woman <S%H802><s%> whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath appointed <S%H3198><s%> for my master <S%H113><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>.

And before I had done <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> in my heart <S%H3820><s%>, behold <S%H7259><s%>, Rebekah came forth <S%H3318><s%> with her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> on her shoulder <S%H7926><s%>; and she went down <S%H3381><s%> unto the fountain <S%H5869><s%>, and drew <S%H7579><s%>: and I said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H8248><s%>, Let me drink, I pray thee.

And she made haste <S%H4116><s%>, and let down <S%H3381><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> from her shoulder <S%H559><s%>, and said, Drink <S%H8354><s%>, and I will give <S%H8248><s%> thy camels <S%H1581><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> also <S%H8354><s%>: so I drank, and she made <S%H8248><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> drink also <S%H8248><s%>.

And I asked <S%H7592><s%> her <S%H559><s%>, and said, Whose daughter <S%H1323><s%> art thou <S%H559><s%>? And she said, The daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%>, Nahor <S%H5152><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>, whom Milcah <S%H4435><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> unto him <S%H7760><s%>: and I put the ring <S%H5141><s%> upon her nose <S%H639><s%>, and the bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon her hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And I bowed my head <S%H6915><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>, who had led me <S%H5148><s%> in the right <S%H571><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> my master <S%H113><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%> for his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And now if ye will <S%H3426><s%> deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with my master <S%H113><s%>, tell <S%H5046><s%> me <S%H5046><s%>: and if not, tell me <S%H6437><s%>; that I may turn to the right hand <S%H3225><s%>, or <S%H176><s%> to the left <S%H8040><s%>.

Then Laban <S%H3837><s%> and Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, The thing <S%H1697><s%> proceedeth <S%H3318><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: we cannot <S%H3201><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto thee bad <S%H7451><s%> or <S%H176><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>.

Behold <S%H7259><s%>, Rebekah is before thee <S%H6440><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> her <S%H3212><s%>, and go, and let her be thy master <S%H113><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>, as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H85><s%>, that, when Abraham's servant <S%H5650><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> their words <S%H1697><s%>, he bowed himself down <S%H7812><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And the servant <S%H5650><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and raiment <S%H899><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>: he gave <S%H5414><s%> also to her brother <S%H251><s%> and to her mother <S%H517><s%> precious things <S%H4030><s%>.

And they did eat <S%H398><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%>, he and the men <S%H582><s%> that were with him <S%H3885><s%>, and tarried all night; and they rose up <S%H6965><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%>, Send me away <S%H7971><s%> unto my master <S%H113><s%>.

And her brother <S%H251><s%> and her mother <S%H517><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Let the damsel <S%H5291><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> with us a few days <S%H3117><s%>, at the least <S%H176><s%> ten <S%H6218><s%>; after <S%H310><s%> that she shall go <S%H3212><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H309><s%>, Hinder me not <S%H3068><s%>, seeing Jehovah hath prospered <S%H6743><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%>; send me away <S%H7971><s%> that I may go <S%H3212><s%> to my master <S%H113><s%>.
And they said <S%H559><s%>, We will call <S%H7121><s%> the damsel <S%H5291><s%>, and inquire <S%H7592><s%> at her mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
And they called <S%H7121><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H3212><s%>, Wilt thou go with this man <S%H376><s%>? And she said <S%H559><s%>, I will go <S%H3212><s%>.
And they sent away <S%H7971><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>, and her nurse <S%H3243><s%>, and Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s servant <S%H5650><s%>, and his men <S%H582><s%>.

And they blessed <S%H1288><s%> Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H859><s%>, Our sister <S%H269><s%>, be thou <S%H1961><s%> the mother of thousands <S%H505><s%> of ten thousands <S%H7233><s%>, and let thy seed <S%H2233><s%> possess <S%H3423><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of those that hate them <S%H8130><s%>.
